account.try_again_later: Please request for verification again in 5 minutes.
account.need_login: You are not logged in. Please log in.

Verification code has been sent to your inbox.
Please check your email to proceed with verification
account.authentication_recover_label:
Verification code has been sent to your inbox. 
Please check your email to recover your password
account.expired_verification: Verification has expired. Please request verification again.
account.unmatched_verification: The verification code is incorrect. please try again. (%{error}/5)
account.resend_verification: Verification has been requested again. Please check the new verification code.
account.recover_error: Too many requests. please try again.
account.recover_verification_error: Can't find user. Please start from the beginning.
account.reset_current_error: The current password is not correct. Please start from the beginning.
account.reset_error: Password change error. Please start from the beginning.
account.lockdown_text:
Your account is being protected after 5 failed login attempts..
Enter the verification code sent to your inbox.
account.resending_code_mail_label: Did you not receive an email?
account.expired_logout: You've been logged out due to inactivity.
account.insert_ethaddress: Please enter your Ethereum wallet address.
account.already_insert_ethaddress: This is your registered Ethereum wallet address.

account_errors.authentication_code_do_not_match: The verification code does not match.
account_errors.password_too_short: Password must be at least '%{password_minimum_length}' digits.
account_errors.simple_password: Password must contain both letters and numbers
account_errors.incorrect_password_warning:
If you have entered the wrong password more than 5 times, your account will be locked
Additional authentication is required.
account_errors.server: Server communication error. Communication error. Please contact us.
account_errors.duplicate_email: Email duplicate error. Please try again with another email.

kyc.start_step1: Take a photo of your ID
kyc.start_step2: Take a selfie holding your ID card
kyc.step1_text: You will need the ID in order to complete the next step.
kyc.step1_complete_text: Was the photo of your ID clearly visible?
kyc.step1_tip_text_header: Tips on taking a clear photo
kyc.step1_tip_case1: · Please take photo on a contrasting background
kyc.step1_tip_case2: · Please take photo inside the frame
kyc.step2_text: Self-authentication photos must be clearly visible and should not have blur or contrasts
kyc.step2_desc1: Take a selfie holding the ID used for step 1
kyc.step2_desc2: The information you have entered in step 1 must match your ID.
kyc.take_ID: Please take a photo of the front side of your ID card
kyc.take_ID_text: All corners of the ID must be clearly visible.
kyc.submit_text: Your submission is currently under review. We will inform you the results through notification.
kyc.submit_error: KYC communication error. Please contact us.
kyc.camera_access_denied_text: You will need to take a selfie during the KYC verification stage. Please allow camera access so we can continue with your KYC verification.
kyc.argos: Please read and agree to the Argos Terms and Conditions
kyc.decline_warning: KYC approval may be rejected in the following cases.
kyc.decline_case2: If you submitted a selfie photo without holding an ID card
kyc.decline_case3: If the information entered is different from the information on the ID card
kyc.decline_case4: Submitting an ID card without either a photo, name, date of birth, nationality
kyc.decline_case5: If you submit your social security number without hiding the last 7 digits (Koreans only)
kyc.networking_argos: Communicating with Argos. Please wait a moment.
kyc.image_processing:
Image processing is in progress.
Please wait a moment.

product.send_purchase_link: Transaction link was delivered to your email. Please click on the link from the browser where Metamask is installed.
product.email_restriction: Sending mail is limited to once every 30 seconds. Please try again after 30 seconds.
product.non_purchasable: These tokens cannot be swapped. Please check your KYC approval and Ethereum wallet address.
product.restricted_country: Token swap is currently not supported in your region.
product.subscribed: Reservation is complete. We will notify you of changes to the product.
product.subscribed_already: This product has already been booked.
product.subscribe_fail: This product is not available for reservation.
product.for_subscription: The above figures are for determining product yield and are not reflected in the actual reservation. Please confirm when exchanging later!

product_label.available_token: Quantity of investable real estate tokens

more.contact_text: Please fill out and submit inquiry below.
more.question_submitted: Your inquiry has been successfully submitted. We will reply by email as soon as possible.
more.contact_restriction: Sending inquiries is limited to one per minute. Please try again in 1 minute.
more.check_text: After checking the following, proceed with the wallet connection.
more.check_1: The wallet address registered once cannot be changed.
more.check_2: Only one wallet address can be used per user.
more.find_more: You can check it in My Account in More

dashboard.ownership_error: You do not have ownership of this property.
dashboard.no_ownership: You have no token swap history
dashboard.need_kyc_wallet: KYC verification and wallet connection is required for token swap.
dashboard.event_guide_EL: EL will be deposited to the address after the event is closed
investment_guide_header: Create a transaction with an authenticated wallet
investment_guide_text:
After purchasing EL from a listed exchange, 
please deposit EL to your authentication wallet address!

After selecting the product you like,
Please select the number of real estate tokens to invest!
Please make a transaction using Metamask!
Profits are generated based on real estate tokens owned.

notification.profit: Daily reserves of $%{profit} have been applied.
notification.saved_90days: Notifications received are kept for 90 days.

question: What can I do with this app?
What is a reserve and how is it distributed?
How do I exchange real estate tokens and ELs?
kyc has been rejected. What should I do next?
Why do I need kyc?
What is the Ethereum wallet address and how can I get it?
Why register an Ethereum wallet address?
answer: You can register or exchange spot-based ERC20 tokens. After identification is completed, you can receive points based on the tokens you hold.

This is an additional reward token proportional to the period of holding the token. The accumulation is calculated from the moment you hold the token. The quantity may be different for each token, so please check the contract.

On the main screen, you can check the types of tokens you have, and you can select and enter the tokens you want to exchange. You can exchange as many as you want by pressing the'Cancel Exchange' button on the page.
You can check the reason for rejection of KYC in the notification message. Please check the reason and request KYC again.
Each individual token exchange is the responsibility of each person, but since the distribution of revenue is based on the linked assets for each token, accurate identification is required.

This is the address of the wallet that can exchange Ethereum or ERC tokens. It can be created in various services such as Metamask (https://metamask.io/) or MyEtherWallet (https://www.myetherwallet.com/). How to Create Please refer to each service description.

This app provides only the information of each token and provides only the convenience of exchange, and the actual exchange is a decentralized service that takes place in each individual wallet. Therefore, in order to use this app, you need a personal wallet address to perform the actual exchange.

legacy.refund_notice: Refund usually takes up to 3 business days and the team in charge will contact you by email.
